content.description:
Granite Sphinx of Taharqo, 680 BCE
© The Trustees of the British Museum
The Sphinx of Taharqo likely depicts a Nubian king of the twenty-fifth dynasty.
content.question: The sculpture depicted in the image best provides evidence of which of the following?

choices.label: One of the world’s earliest advanced, large-scale societies
The early spread of Bantu linguistic influence in Africa
An undocumented period in African history
Emerging centers of learning in West Africa

content.answer: One of the world’s earliest advanced, large-scale societies

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
